DD_2807_1.name: DD Form 2807-1
DD_2807_1.title: Report of Medical History
DD_2807_1.description: Documents medical history for commissioning physical. All blocks must be completed honestly and thoroughly.
instructions: Complete all blocks - do not leave any blank
Answer all medical history questions truthfully
List all surgeries, hospitalizations, and medical conditions
Include dates and outcomes for all medical events
Sign and date the form
tips: Review your medical records before completing
Disclose everything - hidden conditions can disqualify you later
Get copies of records for any conditions you disclose

DD_2808.name: DD Form 2808
DD_2808.title: Report of Medical Examination
DD_2808.description: Commissioning physical examination. Must be completed by a military physician or authorized provider.
instructions: Schedule physical through your medical department
Bring completed DD 2807-1 to appointment
Fasting may be required - confirm with medical
Bring glasses/contacts and prescription
Audiogram must be within 3 years
tips: Schedule 60+ days before deadline - waivers take time
Keep copies of all medical documentation

DD_93.name: DD Form 93
DD_93.title: Record of Emergency Data
DD_93.description: Documents emergency contacts and beneficiary designations. Must be current.
instructions: Verify all information is current
Update beneficiary designations as needed
Ensure emergency contacts are accurate
Submit updates through unit S-1
tips: Review annually and after major life events
Keep personal copy of completed form

NAVMC_10274.name: NAVMC 10274
NAVMC_10274.title: Administrative Action Form
NAVMC_10274.description: Standard format for administrative requests including program applications. Used for WO application letter.
instructions: Use current version (check MCPEL)
Follow SECNAV M-5216.5 formatting
Include SSIC appropriate to request type
Route through chain of command
Keep copies at each endorsement level

NAVMC_11580.name: NAVMC 11580
NAVMC_11580.title: Command Screening Checklist
NAVMC_11580.description: Documents command screening and duty status for special programs and schools.
instructions: Complete all sections applicable to your program
Obtain CO signature and endorsement
Include duty status waiver if not on full duty
Submit 5 working days before deadline if waiver needed

SGLV_8286.name: SGLV 8286
SGLV_8286.title: SGLI Election and Certificate
SGLV_8286.description: Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance election form. Note: Most elections now done via SOES.
instructions: Access SOES via milConnect for most changes
Paper form only for part-time coverage members
Review beneficiary designations
Submit changes through personnel office
tips: SOES is the official system of record
Paper form for special circumstances only

SF_86.name: SF 86
SF_86.title: Questionnaire for National Security Positions
SF_86.description: Security clearance investigation questionnaire. Completed via e-QIP system.
instructions: Complete via e-QIP when initiated by FSO
Gather 10 years of addresses and employment
List all foreign contacts and travel
Be thorough and accurate - errors cause delays
tips: Foreign contacts are common - disclose them

MCRC.description: Official WO program information and sample applications
